Alabama.notes: Notarized documents require probate judge authentication of notary commission before SOS

Georgia.notes: Notarized documents require county clerk certification before SOS apostille

Hawaii.notes: Documents notarized by notary public require Lt. Governor authentication before apostille

Kentucky.notes: County clerk must certify notary signature before Secretary of State authentication

Maryland.notes: County clerk certification required for notarized documents before state apostille

New York.notes: Vital records and notarized documents require county clerk authentication where notary is commissioned

Tennessee.notes: Notarized documents need county clerk certification before state apostille

California.notes: Direct to Secretary of State - no county requirement

Texas.notes: Direct to Secretary of State - no county requirement

Florida.notes: Direct to Secretary of State - no county requirement

Illinois.notes: Direct to Secretary of State - no county requirement

Pennsylvania.notes: Direct to Secretary of State - no county requirement

Ohio.notes: Direct to Secretary of State - no county requirement

Michigan.notes: Direct to Secretary of State - no county requirement

North Carolina.notes: Direct to Secretary of State - no county requirement

Virginia.notes: Direct to Secretary of State - no county requirement

Washington.notes: Direct to Secretary of State - no county requirement

Arizona.notes: Direct to Secretary of State - no county requirement

Massachusetts.notes: Direct to Secretary of State - no county requirement

Indiana.notes: Direct to Secretary of State - no county requirement

Missouri.notes: Direct to Secretary of State - no county requirement

Wisconsin.notes: Direct to Secretary of State - no county requirement

Colorado.notes: Direct to Secretary of State - no county requirement
